author: terencechain
content:

```
2023/03/21 08:50:11 App failed: offset 0 is incorrect, expected 16, got 60: unable to send transaction
```

```
> WARN [03-21|08:46:49.730] Served eth_sendRawTransaction            conn=127.0.0.1:55884 reqid=2 duration=8.477791ms err="offset 0 is incorrect, expected 16, got 60"
```

author: inphi
content: I've updated blob-utils. Lemme know if it doesn't work for you.

author: roberto.bayardo
content: Should we move blob-utils into eip8844-interop rather than have it separate <@159152274659082240> ?  We could put something in the CI to make sure it doesn't get out of sync
